official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide assistance for the initiation and expansion of children's preventive health programs.
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Children's Preventive Health Act of 1983 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants (through the Centers for Disease Control) for children's preventive health programs of: (1) lead poisoning prevention; (2) school-based fluoridation; and (3) new-born infant genetic disease screening. Sets forth grant application requirements. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1984 through FY 1986.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide assistance for the initiation and expansion of children's preventive health programs.
